name: Titel ReDUCKted
description:
Titel ReDUCKted is a Project created in cooperation together with Yorschor, Skepsel and Pietflosse and amueller95 during the JamIsland 2022 (Schmiede2022). 

  Whats Titel ReDUCKted? 

Titel ReDUCKted is a local Multiplayer Game, a Party-Game created for you to comped against your friends and show them who the mightiest Duck in this pond is. ReDUCKted also educates children about something really important --> How cooked Ducks are created. 

Gameplay

Each of the four Player plays as one of four different Rubberducks. 

 Player 1  Player 2  Player 3  Player 4

Each Player has to hunt the other Players. The Ducks can shoot at each other and you have to dodge the bullets, shoot at you while hopefully shooting the other ducks down.  The Goal of the Game is to eat each other, as a hunted Duck turns into a cooked Duck.  

Controls As a Rubberduck Left Stick: Moving the Duck around A: Shoot a Bullet As a cooked Duck A: Dash Left Stick: Control Dash-Direction
